descriptionHtml:
This is my 360 controller config. I found this set up to be the best for my needs. It includes 8 config hotkeys for items, spells, weapons. 4 quick menu keys. Quick save/ load keys. POV switch and zoom in out keys. It even has a key for auto move.

|-Install-|
Place controlmap.txt in \\Data\\Interface\\Controls\\PC\\

|-Bugs-|
(fixed)For some reason you lose the ability to assign spells, and weapons to specific hands when in the favorites menu.(fixed) - Thanks streetstar5
A and B hotkeys have to be set with the keyboard. However X and Y can be set with just the controller.

|-Notes-|  
I used Skyrim Pad Config by GPI to make this so if you like to edit it or make one of your own check it out here http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=655
author: Rob-i
